## ShortcutRegistry.onKeyDown() method

Handles key down events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onKeyDown(workspace: Workspace, e: KeyboardEvent): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | The main workspace where the event was captured. |
|  e | KeyboardEvent | The key down event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the event was handled, false otherwise.
